Christian Mueller

  10. Gender: male

Source: "Riders of the Orphan Trains: Nebraska," http://www.usgennet.org/usa/ne/topic/trains/riders.htm; Journey's End: An Orphan Train Rider's Story, (n.p.), p. 41-48 [Train to Red Cloud]; National Orphan Train Complex; Interview with George Wells, 12 July 1983 by Don Connors and Mildred Bennett; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1900 United States Federal Census; The Red Cloud Chief, 13 September 1984.
